There are also no power bricks in the game with the related extras available for purchase separately.

name: Kingyo Chuuihou! Wapiko no Waku-waku Stamp Rally
description: Kingyo Chuuihou! Wapiko no Waku-waku Stamp Rally is a puzzle game based on the Goldfish Warning manga.

name: Kingyo Chuuihou! 2 Gyopi-chan wo Sagase!
description: Kingyo Chuuihou! 2 Gyopi-chan wo Sagase! is the second puzzle game in the Goldfish Warning! series.

name: Rugby League Live 2: World Cup Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Open World
description: Welcome to an exciting sandbox where you can create not only cubes, but also various inclined and rounded surfaces at any angle and any size. And all this is online, in a joint stream of creativity with other players. Of the 1500+ PBR materials, there is sure to be one suitable for your idea. Will it be your own little cozy house? Castle? Ship? City? Space station? Dungeon? Trade area? Pier? The only limit is your imagination.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story I: Sentritsu no Blue
description: Sentritsu no Blue is the first game in the Blue Destiny trilogy of Gundam-based shooters.

name: Oni: Road to be the Mightiest Oni
description:
Break your enemy's heart to reclaim your pride.
Kuuta, a demon, once challenged a man to a battle and was defeated.
At last, he arrives at Kisejima Island. He and his partner Kazemaru, whom he met on the island, overcome their ordeal as one, gaining new strength along the way.
This time, will the duo be able to achieve victory?
Join Kuuta on his adventure to get revenge against Momotaro, a demon masquerading as a man.

name: Arcana of Paradise: The Tower
description: Choose from 20 children and perfect your deck as you battle against The Tower's bizarre inhabitants in real time! Time your guards, combo your attacks, charge up powerful magic, and collect legendary relics in your search for food, as you guide the children to the bottom!

name: Captain Velvet Meteor: The Jump+ Dimensions
description: "Captain Velvet Meteor: The Jump+ Dimensions" is a Tactical Adventure game. Our gameplay is divided between free-roaming exploration segments and strategic battles with light puzzle & stealth elements.

name: Lawn Buster for Hire
description: This game takes about 10 minutes to complete, and there are 5 different endings based on your decisions.

name: LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars
description:
The Saga continues. Build, battle and laugh your way across the Star Wars universe like never before! Play as Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi through a story spanning the entire Clone Wars era. LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars combines epic space battles, challenging puzzles and of course, the imaginative gameplay of LEGO.

The Sith and their allies have declared war on the Jedi Council with an army of droids, and it’s up to you to stop them. With the Dark Side gathering power and entire star systems in turmoil, galactic freedom hangs in the balance.

name: Young Justice: Legacy
description: The Nintendo 3DS port of Young Justice: Legacy, a multiplayer action RPG based on the Young Justice TV series.

name: Solarpunk
description:
Solarpunk is a survival game in a technically advanced world of floating islands. Alone or together with your friends, you can construct buildings, grow food, craft gadgets and explore distant islands with your own airship.

Use sunlight, wind and water to create an energy system and automate your processes like gathering ressoureces, watering your plants or catching fish.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Plankton's Robotic Revenge
description:
Plankton and his new legion of evil robots have destroyed the Krusty Krab and stolen the safe that houses the famous Krabby Patty formula! It’s up to you to locate the hidden keys for the safe before the secret is lost forever!

Play as five of your favourite characters - SpongeBob, Patrick, Sandy, Squidward and Mr. Krabbs. Switch between them as often as you’d like! Travel across lands from the show: Bikini Bottom, Rock Bottom and Dutchman's Triangle.

name: High Dimension
description:
High Dimension is a roguelike where you explore in search of the High Dimension puzzle of events involving science and magic.

Take on the role of Leinad, an intelligent medieval nobleman, or Carol, a strong fighter who doesn't bow to anyone, explore environments in pixel art procedures.

It happens in a realm so far away. There was an event called High Dimension that merged our dimensions in relation to time and space. The king called two young men to find out what was going on. The world is upside down, always forming new realities, your mission is to discover the cause of all this. Upgrade equipment, swords, use items strategically, with action combat.

name: No Reloading: Survival Trials
description: Infinite destruction in infinite combinations! No Reloading: Survival Trials is a third-person rogue-lite style shooter taking inspiration from classics like Max Payne. Slay simulants, earn upgrades, and look cool while doing it!

name: Cosmonious High
description: Welcome to Cosmonious High, new kid! Owlchemy Labs presents an out-of-this-world VR experience with their hallmark interactivity and distinctive humor. Meet a colorful cast, adapt outrageous alien powers, and discover the source of the school’s malfunctions to save Cosmonious High from chaos.

name: Cemantle & Pedantle
description:
Daily word games that can be played solo or collaboratively in a team and gives players a daily ranking.
In Cemantle, players have to find a secret word by trying to get as close as possible in its semantic field.
In Pedantle, players must uncover a Wikipedia page by guessing each word of its intro following the same tules as cémantix.

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - M for Mystery
description: Mycroft's agents were outsmarted, and confidential documents have been stolen. You are tasked with locating a shadowy figure known only as M. It appears there is a worthy opponent at large on Cordona.

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Saints and Sinners
description: Sherlock is forced to find the boundary between church and state, challenging his commitment to the law and justice.

name: Prinny Presents: NIS Classics Vol 3
description: Join up with your pal Prinny to experience NIS history with Prinny Presents NIS Classics Volume 3: La Pucelle: Ragnarok / Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure!

name: Clik Flip
description: Search the bizarre parallel world for the fabled hotdog. Items you shift on one side influence things on the other. Hot dog of all hot dogs, this is the game you didn’t know you’ve always wanted.

name: Hyper Light Breaker
description: Enter the Overgrowth, a new land in the world of Hyper Light. Play alone or with friends to explore massive biomes, defeat brutal monsters, create new builds, survive the mysterious Crowns and overthrow the almighty Abyss King in this adventure from the creators of Hyper Light Drifter.

name: Cataclysm: Bright Nights
description: Cataclysm: Bright Nights is an open source fork of Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead. Bright Nights emphasizes game balance and interesting combat with heavier sci-fi aspects over grounded realism focused simulation of Cataclysm:DDA. Additionally Bright Nights contains a lot of rebalanced and reworked game mechanics, optimizations and Quality of Life features to make gameplay more fluid and enjoyable.

name: Seventh Lair
description: From Novectacle, the creators of the highly acclaimed The House in Fata Morgana, comes Seventh Lair, a tongue-in-cheek, but emotional look at the online interactions between an indie game developer and fans!

name: The Last Defense TD
description:
Follow the unique narrative in this Fantasy Tower Defence and lead your mages, strategically deploying them to defend the last kingdom standing - Murgaz.
Take part in the war from King Severin’s perspective.

name: MicroProse Golf
description: MicroProse Golf is a golf video game developed by The Thought Train and published by MicroProse. It was released in 1991 for Amiga and Atari ST. In 1992, an enhanced MS-DOS version, featuring golf instructor David Leadbetter, was released in the United States as David Leadbetter's Greens and in the United Kingdom as David Leadbetter's Golf. The game's variety was praised, and some critics considered it the best golf game available.

name: The Ssum
description: New mobile otome game from the creators of Mystic Messenger.

name: Behind the Screen & Defoliation
description: Behind the Screen & Defoliation is a suspense puzzle set of games.

name: Let's Play Curling!!
description: Genuine Curling now on the Nintendo Switch! Utilize simple controls to make that all-important game-winning throw!

name: Betia Pera-pera English Adventure
description: Betia Pera Pera English Adventure is an immersion-type Interactive English conversation learning game in which users encounter battles and collect items by communicating with the characters of the game by listening, speaking, and writing, learning the correct pronunciation, and daily conversation as they play.

name: SRG Mixtape Volume #2
description: Super Rare Mixtape Vol. 2 is a physical indie game collection including 30 games and 6 demos. Packaged as a USB drive shaped like cassette tape with only a limited number sold.

name: Driv3r
description: Driv3r for Game Boy Advance brings the action-packed experience of the renowned console series to handheld gaming. Step into the shoes of undercover cop Tanner as you navigate through intense missions across sprawling cities like Miami, Nice, and Istanbul. The game offers a blend of high-speed car chases, on-foot pursuits, and shootouts, all rendered in impressive graphics. With a gripping storyline, diverse missions, and a variety of vehicles to commandeer, Driv3r on GBA captures the essence of the original while delivering an engaging experience on the go.

name: Bibi & Tina: New Adventures with Horses
description: A violent storm has hit the area near Martinshof. Mount up and see what damage the storm has done. Ride across the fields, jump over numerous obstacles and have Bibi the witch magic away the mess. But most of all, you can have lots of fun in fast-paced horse races, show off your jumping and slalom riding skills, take loving care of the horses and send photos to your worried friend Naomi in Australia.

name: Angry Pigs
description:
Angry Pigs is an action packed shooter where your farm animals become your enemies.

Fight for your life and defend your precious crops in this action-packed shooter.

Uncle Frank went to visit his daughter in the city for the weekend. He accidentally forgot to feed his pigs. Pigs are hungry and are now running around the farm eating everything they find. Help uncle Frank keep his crops by shooting piggies back to the barn. When you shoot a piggy, it returns to the barn, but be fast, there’s hundreds of them coming back to eat your precious crops. Watch out because they bite too. Keep away from those angry ones :)

You have three lives to begin with! Each piggy bite you lose a life. To restore life you can eat a donut. If you're a beginner you might want to choose a difficulty level 1 where pigs are a bit slower and you have unlimited bullets.

name: Super Mega Zero
description: Super Mega Zero is a fast-paced precision platformer and shoot 'em up hybrid with a built in Level Editor. Challenge hundreds of handcrafted levels or make and share your creations with others.

name: Shooting Star Island
description: Shooting Star Island is a big and colorful 3d platformer. Stanky Star will rekindle his powers throughout his journey to the comet's depths, where lost worlds slumber and the Muses of the End sing their songs of destruction.

name: Pad of Time
description: It's time to play a 2.5D retro-style platformer... With a twist!

name: Chubby Cat
description: A cutie little kitty who loves eating. Cut the wool thread precisely to feed the cat. Many stages and lots of fun in this game that suit both children and adults alike.

name: The Textorcist: The Village
description: Follow Ray Bibbia 10 years in the past in this adventure set in a small village where religion is considered only a fad of the past. Unveil the mystery that lurks in Castel di Vania and get ready to face ancient demons with only the help of your trusty bible and your typing skills.

name: Maniac Miner
description: Sin descripción

name: Lords of the Fallen
description:
Lords of the Fallen is a mysterious action game where you battle gothic monsters in a thrilling 1-on-1 combat. Use swipe controls to attack, dodge or parry. But keep in mind that quick wits needs to be combined with the right strategy to defeat enemies.

Jump into a brand new mobile experience set in the universe of Lords of the Fallen. Join Harkyn, Yetka and Kaslo as they journey deep into the heart of a forsaken monastery to end the reign of the Demon Queen Akasha once and for all.

name: Vetrex
description: Vetrex is a game for two in which you will compete with your friend for the winning place using different types of weapons, throwing grenades and dropping red exploding barrels on the enemy's head!

name: Are You Smarter Than the Crowd?
description: You think you're a smart little fella, huh? Well, come on down and prove it in the "Are You Smarter Than the Crowd?" -gameshow! Compete with or against the crowd in a fun I.Q game, hosted by our lovely host!

name: Nightingale: Birth of the Alliance
description: A fun open world RPG space game to explore and trade with a whole detailed galaxy.

name: Tenko's Magical Sword Quest
description: Upbeat precision platformer, with energized photons to reach a super charged state. Take yourself on a tremendous journey to collect all the magical stone pieces.

name: Arrival of the Punnu
description: Arrival of Punnu is a story about Punnu from outer space, explorers who make a crash landing to a planet called Earth. In their mission to fix their broken ship they get an ally of a little child, whose imagination will open up a whole new perspective to our homeplanet.

name: Blocknator
description: In this game, your objective is to fit the pieces on the board to accumulate points. When you complete one or more floors, the pieces are destroyed and you earn points. It’s that simple!

name: Hare Apparent
description: An ancient custom is invoked, and five kingdoms send their young heirs to play a legendary game. Build relationships, form alliances, and win the crown in this high-stakes game of woodland politics and social maneuvering.

name: Armored Firestorm
description: Armored Firestorm is an intense top-down shoot'em up action game in a futurist environments. At the controls of your Hovertank, survive against the attack of the machines in the orbital city of the federation.

name: A Butterfly's Dream
description: Be a Butterfly in this beautiful and relaxing game with no goals or enemies. Based on a Zen tale.

name: Frontier Fortress
description: Frontier Fortress is medieval-themed tower defense game. You are the leader of your nation. In the harsh medieval age you have to defend your land against foreign invaders. Fortify your frontier with defense structures and let none of them pass through your fortress.

name: Easter Bunny
description: Easter Bunny is a 2D top-down stealth action game about an Easter bunny hiding Easter eggs.

name: Heroes of the Dark
description: Battle Vampires, Werewolves and Humans in a dark Imperial Age strategy game! Collect and upgrade Heroes for 5v5 action, forge alliances, and restore world order.

name: Healing Simulator
description: Take the role of healer in your party's quest again evil. Manage your party's health with healing spells in this strategy RPG.

name: Tomb Robbing with Friends
description: A multiplayer game about looting tombs and pushing your friends into traps so you can steal their treasures! Dodge spikes, grab coins and become the richest tomb robber!

name: Terry Poorflyer
description: Help Terry Poorflyer escape an island ruled by evil crabs! Inspired by retro side-scrolling platformers, Terry Poorflyer adds own "stomp" flair to it, handled by physics engine more advanced than in HL3!

name: Bird and Beast Fantasy
description: This is a national style pixel art, action role-playing independent game.

name: Go, Go, Knight!
description: Long live the brave knight! He is ready to fight skeletons and dodge traps to save this world ... or he just wants to find ancient treasures. It doesn't matter - Go, Go, Knight!

name: Where are My Mittens
description: A lost kitty. A dangerous environment. It's snowing. A cute indie platformer about a boy named Jason looking for a kitty named Mittens. Requires a standard qwerty keyboard and mouse.

name: Radon Break
description: Radon Blast is a classic Brick Breaker / Arkanoid style game. Break bricks by using the ball. Get items like speed, ball splitter and paddle resize to make the game more challenging. Some specials like gun, power ball or block wall helps you while playing your game.

name: Signals of Chaos
description: In an isolated vessel you find that the only path forward is through an endless wave of enemies. Upgrade and configure your ship to get through as many of them as you can, and perhaps a better tomorrow awaits you on the other side.

name: Jumpy Mia
description: Meet the always smiling girl and help her jump over enemies. Collect coins on differently constructed levels, discover a beautiful world and defeat a wide range of opponents. Join Jumpy Mia’s adventure now!

name: Spingram
description: Spingram is an exciting puzzle game that will blow your brain, with hundreds of levels and an extraordinary design. Our minds love challenges, and Spingram goes the extra mile to challenge players' gray matter. The goal of the game is to reconstruct the pattern presented in the preview by rotating the blocks in any direction. To align the trace perfectly you will need to examine the position and orientation of the original. If you are in trouble, you can always start over or undo the last move.

name: Witch's Tales
description: A young witch Alice, striving to master her skills, decides to become a student of Circe, one of the most powerful witches. However, after discovering that Circe is going to turn all of the famous princes into frogs until one of them marries her, Alice turns against the witch. Now she needs to break the curse, cast upon princes and restore peace in kingdom.

name: Mahjong Business Style
description: Become a business shark – play Mahjong on the exchange! Complete more than 100 levels, earning points and countless trophies. Each pack embodies a separate market – from stocks to advanced technologies—and each level contains special high-value gold pieces to collect! Enjoy classic levels or challenge yourself with levels that include wandering pieces, in which the arrangement of the tokens changes with each new attempt! Climb the ladder of success and Wall Street will bow to you!

name: Artifact Hunter: The Lost Prophecy
description: After the disappearance of his father, Jason grew up into a treasure hunter willing to risk life and limb to find rare and valuable artifacts. When he finds his father’s old journal, he learns that he disappeared while on the trail of an artifact he referred to as the Lost Prophecy.

name: Papilio
description: Take the fight to the skies in this fantasy 2D shootemup!

name: Bad Writer
description: Get ideas. Write short stories. Sell them to magazines. Try and keep happy and not give up from all the rejections.

name: 10 Flights of Ballooning
description: 10 Flights of Ballooning is 10 mini-games based on the Balloon Trip mode in the original game Balloon Fight for NES.

name: Knightfall: A Daring Journey
description: Two knights, a strong bond, and a long journey. Take up the race for the rose, ride from village to village and take shelter before nightfall by any means necessary! If your bond is strong and your horse drifts well, you can be the recipient of the fabled rose. Luckily you brought guns!

name: Dungeongame
description: A deckbuilder tower defense game where you build a dungeon to fend off human invaders.

name: Electricman 2: The Tournament of Voltagen
description: The Tournament of Voltagen is the combat tournament you fight your way through in Electric Man. The game features many different locations, each unique to the enemy being fought.

name: Avatar Arena
description: Avatar Arena is 2D action fighting game based on the lore of the cartoon TV series Avatar: The Last Air Bender.

name: In the Hole
description:
Light the Way!

Young Thyme has fallen into a hole in the ground, finding themselves surrounded by darkness in a strange dungeon. A mysterious entity allows them to borrow a magical lantern filled with fireflies to help them navigate the dark halls, and defend against the angry spirits.

Can Thyme make it out of the dungeon alive? At what cost?

name: Probe: A Game Dev Experience
description: Experience the magic of the videogame production cycle. Go behind the scenes and discover how videogames are designed, the programming which underlies them, and the digital art which brings them to life!

name: Rune Infinite
description: Crush opponents while earning unique prizes in this fast-paced fantasy PvP brawler from Rune: a crypto gaming company pushing NFT games to new horizons. Choose your class, customize your avatar, and collect unique NFTs playing the third game in Rune’s ever-expanding Metaverse. Test your skills against players across the globe and rise above the rest as Champion of the Infinite Arena.

name: Yoshi's Racing Story
description: Yoshi's Racing Story is a ROM hack/mod of Diddy Kong Racing which adds Yoshi as a playable character and also new levels based on the Yoshi franchise.

name: Mario's New Earth
description: Mario's New Earth is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario 64 created by PixelSM64, with 125 Stars.

name: Trust No Bunny
description:
Everybunny has a secret. Who do you trust to keep the town safe?

Trust No Bunny is a 5-8 player social deduction mission game for fans of Avalon, Town of Salem, Among Us, or Werewolf, actively being developed by new studio Friendly Pixel. It's a game for thinkers, schemers, and downright liars, where guessing the traitor is only half the battle.

name: Bionicle: Kapura Adventures
description: Step into the shoes of the iconic Matoran Kapura in his quest to move as fast as he can. Bionicle: Kapura Adventures features high-octane gameplay the likes of which you’ve never seen before. Discover the secrets of the island with more than 2 collectibles to unlock, and join Kapura as he undertakes his biggest challenge yet.

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Popo Team
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeons of Aether
description: Dungeons of Aether is a turn-based dungeon crawler designed by Nick ‘ampersandbear’ Blackwood from the Aether Studios team. Rivals of Aether is known for its intense competition and twitch skills, while Dungeons of Aether allows you to take things at your own pace - but it’s still just as challenging! Every choice you make can lead you deeper into the dungeons or to an early demise.

name: Maldark: Conqueror of All Worlds
description: Maldark: Conqueror of All Words is a game where users can complete quests to level up. The game contains avatar creation to be able to play it. Each avatar has a special weapon to help them fight enemies and complete quests.

name: Star Defenders
description: Star Defenders is a sandbox fast-paced platformer that takes place on random planets colonized by Star Defenders - the organization of people who've been protecting the idea of star exploration (which is why were mockingly called "Star Defenders" back on Earth). Star Defenders are on a journey to escape supermassive black hole on Mothership.

name: Tumbleweed Destiny
description: The somewhat hateful and slightly charming tumbleweed is the star of the game. This game is a tumbleweed life simulator that depicts the fate of tumbleweeds in my own imagination.

name: Yuuto Ichika Gets DMCA'd
description: Yuuto Ichika Gets DMCA'd is a bootleg fangame of Super Ledgehop: Double Laser and Yuuto Ichika Makes Friends! Play as best bootleg Yuuto Ichika, and defeat bosses solely by dashing!

name: A Slit of Joy
description: Finn was sad, so he killed himself. But he was greeted by Aoi a mysterious girl who granted him one wish before he gets reincarnated. Finn's wish, he wanted to see if anyone cared at all that he had committed suicide. Even though he knows no one ever cared about him.

name: Ed-0: Zombie Uprising
description:
Ed-0: Zombie Uprising takes place in Edo era Japan—but millions of zombies have raided the isolated country! Enter this world as a Samurai, Sumo Wrestler, or Ninja to slaughter the massive horde of undead. Strengthen your character by gathering items and skills in unique dungeons. Everything is randomly generated each time you play! No run is the same. Dungeons won't be easy, so expect tension with every run—fight to the brink of death and make harsh decisions to survive.

Encounter countless surprises and unpredictable adversaries as you expand your power and achieve greatness. Every run is unique. Player judgment will be essential, having to face “once-in-a-lifetime” challenges amid a hoard of zombies.

name: Space Beastz
description: Space Beastz is a cooperative multiplayer music and rhythm game. On a music-playing spaceship, players must time their actions just right to keep multiple instruments running and make the most amazing music the galaxy has ever heard!

name: Past Synergy
description: Past Synergy is a 2 player co-op game that tests you and your friend's synergy. Divide the ability and roles between you and your friend to overcome the obstacles in a cave that appears in your dream every night.

name: SM64 Generations
description:
SM64 Generations is a mod that adds Mario from Super Mario 64 to Sonic Generations, including its own abilities (including the famous Backwards Long Jump) and even the Wing Cap.

This mod needs both Sonic Generations and Super Mario 64 to work.

name: Garden of Seif: Chronicles of an Assassin
description: Garden of Seif is a narrative-driven game where choices matter. Play as Iris Lapis, an assassin navigating a world of danger, adventure, and romance. Two enemy love interests arrive and claim to be trustworthy, but can they win her heart?

name: Wormhole
description: Jump and dash across space as you race against time in this punishing, fast-paced platformer. Be careful where you land, as the path ahead is filled with portals that will send you back. Will you beat the clock and escape the loop?
